bio:
I am Minhaz-Ul-Islam Ridoy. And I specialize in Digital marketing, SEO, and WordPress with 3+ years of experience. I have great expertise in On-page SEO, Off-page SEO, Google webmaster, Google Analytics, Google Adwords, Facebook ad campaigns, and Amazon affiliate.

I am a Proactive and Result Oriented marketing professional and committed to delivering your desired results at your satisfaction level. I am always learning more marketing techniques and keeping up to date with search engine algorithm changes.

Logical and creative thinking, detail-oriented, effective communication, and multitasking are my strengths.

---Try me out once and you will never regret your decision.

SEO Work Overview: On-page SEO, Off-page SEO, and Competitor analysis with full reports.

My On-Page SEO Tasks: 

⚡Keyword Research and Analysis
⚡Focus On Specific Marketing Niche
⚡WordPress SEO plugin and Indexing on Google
⚡HTML tags optimization (h1, h2, h3, title, meta description, meta tags and keywords)
⚡Improve Title Tags and Description Metatag
⚡Effective Headlines and Sub-Headings
⚡Cornerstone Content Checkup
⚡Content Stylizing and Visualization
⚡Image Optimization (include the favicon)
⚡Website Responsiveness + Security + Speed OPtimization

My Off-Page White-hat Link Building Strategies: 

✔Web 2.0 Creation
